sentences.en: Breathing, pulse rate, and blood pressure revert to normal.
sentences.cn: 呼吸 、 脉搏频率和血液恢复正常.

sentences.en: Garden plants sometimes revert to type.
sentences.cn: 园艺植物有时会恢复其原来的野生形态.

sentences.en: He's stopped taking drugs now, but he may revert to taking them again.
sentences.cn: 现在他停止吸毒了, 但他可能故态复萌.

sentences.en: I was soon to revert to these matters.
sentences.cn: 我不久还要重新谈到这些事情.

sentences.en: If unable to contact Kun Ming Control, revert to this frequency.
sentences.cn: 如不能联系昆明管制, 回到这个频率.

sentences.en: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊说她的老板变得越来越抑郁，又重新大量吸烟了。

sentences.en: Let us revert to the earlier part of the chapter.
sentences.cn: 让我们回到本章的前面部分.

sentences.en: Let us revert to the original subject.
sentences.cn: 我们回过来谈原来的主题吧.

sentences.en: Must he revert to Ellen always?
sentences.cn: 难道他非提到母亲不行?

sentences.en: Peasants were allowed to adhere or revert to individual farming in Poland.
sentences.cn: 波兰允许农民坚持或倒退到个体农业.

sentences.en: She had meant to revert to her former condition of important and cultivated uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 她本以为会回复到原先那种关系:有教养而矜持地不作决定.

sentences.en: Some maize with S cytoplasm can revert to the fertile condition.
sentences.cn: 有些具有S细胞质的玉米植株可以逆转为可育状态.

sentences.en: They will revert to tilling the earth in an old-fashioned way.
sentences.cn: 他们将回归到用老方法耕地。

sentences.en: We'll revert to the question of exclusive agency when opportunity arises.
sentences.cn: 一有机会,我们再谈独家代理的问题.

sentences.en: When it returns to shore, the life-jacket will deflate and revert to a harness.
sentences.cn: 返回岸上后，救生衣就会瘪掉，恢复成背带状。

sentences.en: Without endless watering, these fields will quickly revert to desert.
sentences.cn: 如果这些土地得不到为不断的浇灌, 很快就会重新变成沙漠.

words.tran_cn: 应归还的；可恢复原状的
逆转；回复；归还；[遗] 隔代遗传；[法] 继承权

trans.tran_cn: 回复；重提；返祖遗传；归还
trans.tran_en: When people or things revert to a previous state, system, or type of behaviour, they go back to it

trans.tran_cn: 恢复，重提，回到…上，<律>归还
